original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Christmas with The Chipmunks
overview: Collection of the 4 classic holiday episodes, all digitally restored:  1) "A Chipmunk Christmas" (TV Short released in 1981);  2-3) "It's a Wonderful Life, Dave" (Season 6 | Episode 24 | 1988) and "Alvin's Christmas Carol" (Season 7 | Episode 13 | 1989) from the "Alvin & the Chipmunks" (TV Series 1983â€“1990);  4) "A Chipmunk Celebration" (TV Short released in 1994, theme for Thanksgiving Day).
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Christmas with The Chipmunks
